prependFieldNames

public void prependFieldNames(String prepender)
Prepends the name of each field with a string. This is useful when returning to a viewer that required the id of each row e.g. row0_, row1_ etc.

Parameters:
prepender - the prepending string

prependFieldNames

public void prependFieldNames(String prepender,
                              String appender)
Prepends the name of each field with a string and also appends it with another string
. This is useful when returning to a viewer that requires the id of each row e.g. row0_, row1_ etc.

Parameters:
prepender - the prepending string
appender - the appending string
